Voting Info

The single most important act an individual Teamster member can do to help strengthing his/her union is the simplest. Register and exercise your right to vote. By voting Pro Union with your coworkers, Family members and Friends you will protect fairness for the future.

Register to Vote in NJ at the link Below.

http://www.state.nj.us/state/elections/voting-information.html
